system.description: When you make a claim about a strange situation or phenomenon based on your experience, roll + Freak.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: Your experiences are incomplete; the GM will tell you what mistake your flawed understanding leads you to make.

partial.label: Partial success
partial.value: Your claim is incomplete, flawed, or tangential; the GM will tell you how.

success.label: Success!
success.value: You were right; the GM will tell you what opportunity your knowledge grants to you.
